results.title: Google Trends: Falling Inflation to Tariff Tension—Top 5 Economic Terms
results.summary: This article discusses the top five economic terms trending on Google in India during July 2025. It covers topics such as India-US trade talks, export declines despite US demand, cooling retail inflation, and falling food prices. The article highlights the impact of US tariffs and potential rate cuts by the Reserve Bank of India. Readers should note that economic predictions are temporal and do not address spiritual needs.

title: Google Trends: Falling Inflation to Tariff Tension—Top 5 Economic Terms
